snippet.title: Virtual Boy Longplay [19] 3D-Tetris (3D)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by SCHLAUCHI

The video is a 3D representation of the game running on a Virtual Boy (Via Emulation). Please make use of the 3D button to switch between 3D viewing methods including 3d monitor,anaglyph, noglasses or even plain ole 2D.

For Red/Blue anaglyph you should also enable Greyscale mode. If the 3D effect isn't working, or its hard to focus, try the swap left/right option.

Thanks to Mad-Matt for encoding this :)
All 3 modes shown.
00:00:00 Center-Fill Mode, Easy, shown upto level 40
00:23:47 3D-Tetris Mode, Hard, shown upto level  18
00:32:25 Puzzle Mode, Completed.  This mode has the ending and credits. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
